hero.title: The new standard in luxury travel

intro.title: Find the most unique experiences worldwide with Prince Collection
intro.content: Prince Collection is a place for luxury travellers to uncover the newest and the best locations worldwide: The perfect experience for you. We are a leading travel resource delivering on-site reviews, comprehensive guides, and the latest industry news. Prince Collection also features an in-house travel agency and a luxury travel concierge.

news.title: The latest in luxury travel
news.content: Get exclusive content, breaking stories, and the most in depth information about the luxury travel space spanning hotels and accomodation, flights and transportation, restaurants, and more.

book.title: Book your next hotel stay with us
book.content: Through Prince Collection’s access to the world’s best hotels, you’ll enjoy exclusive benefits at no additional cost. By booking with us, you receive:

list.title: Daily breakfast for two people
list.content: Enjoy complimentary breakfast for two at the hotel restaurant, lounge, or in-room dining. Switch it up on consecutive days to explore them all.

list.title: $100 (USD) hotel credit
list.content: Use your $100 (USD) hotel credit towards dining, spa, or other facilities. We will help you to secure reservations in advance.

list.title: Welcome amenity
list.content: A complimentary bottle of wine, snacks, or local gift will be awaiting your arrival. It is completely customizable for special occasions.

list.title: One-category room upgrade, subject to availability
list.content: Either at time of booking or upon arrival, we will take care of your upgrade from start to finish. You can be as hands-on as you prefer.

list.title: Early check-in/late check-out, subject to availability
list.content: Have an early arrival or late flight? Have your room be ready for you and enjoy it until you leave for the airport.

list.title: Property-specific 3rd/4th/5th Night Free promotions
list.content: Exclusive free nights when booking with us, applied automatically. Qualifying hotels and promotions do change over time.

exclusive.title: Exclusive deals and benefits though Prince Collection
exclusive.content: Book with Prince Collection and enjoy access to exclusive deals and features at a broad range of eligible hotels, including luxury brands like Four Seasons, Rosewood, Mandarin Oriental, St. Regis, Waldorf Astoria, Park Hyatt, as well as a wide range of independent boutique luxury properties.

reviews.title: Find inspiration
reviews.content: Join us onsite as we experience the world's best hotels and destinations, while showcasing how Prince Collection’s benefits will elevate your experience.

concierge.title: Your luxury travel concierge
concierge.content: Prince Collection’s Travel Concierge is designed exclusively for high net worth individuals and companies who seek exclusive experiences, handled for them. We understand that time is your most valuable asset. The Prince Collection Concierge is a white-glove service, ensuring a seamless and extraordinary journey from start to finish.

guides.title: Find information
guides.content: Get in-depth information on hotel programs and learn more about Prince Collection’s premier brands and vendors.

newsletter_cta.title: Join the Prince Collection Community
newsletter_cta.content: Join Prince Collection’s newsletter and be at the forefront of new property openings, unique experiences, and exclusive promotions.

hero.title: Your luxury travel concierge
hero.content: Prince Collection’s Travel Concierge is designed exclusively for companies and individuals who require exclusive travel arrangements handled for them. Our expertise lies in handling the nuances of travel, ensuring a seamless and extraordinary journey from start to finish.

section1.title: We're more than a travel agency
section1.content: The Prince Collection Concierge is different from traditional travel agencies. Our services are more unique, complex and are personally tailored to the needs of each and every client. The PC Concierge does not rely on commissions or referrals, and as such we are always able to focus solely on our clients’ needs and best interests. We care for our clients and handle their travel arrangements from start to finish.

section2.title: What does Prince Collection offer?
section2.content: We conduct a thorough evaluation of clients' credit cards, Elite status, and travel habits. This process aids us in developing a full travel strategy document to optimize the client's travel experiences. Our account managers also gain access to client's loyalty accounts to manage bookings, monitor progress to elite status, and ensure all optimized strategies are being implemented.

list.title: Comprehensive onboarding & annual travel strategy
list.content: We conduct a thorough evaluation of clients' credit cards, Elite status, and travel habits. This process aids us in developing a full travel strategy document to optimize the clients' travel experiences.

list.title: Customized trip booking
list.content: Clients communicate their travel requirements to their account manager, who will then research and suggest the best flight and hotel options, keeping in mind the clients' preferences, travel goals, and points balances. Clients only need to sign off on trip proposals, after which the account manager proceeds with the bookings.

list.title: 24/7 emergency travel support
list.content: Our Concierge team is available 24/7 to assist in emergency travel situations. In case of flight cancellations, delays, missed connections, or any other unexpected circumstances, our team adeptly navigates airline systems to achieve the best possible outcomes.

section3.title: Our Guarantee
section3.content: The Travel Concierge at Prince Collection is tailored specifically for high net-worth individuals and businesses in pursuit of unique and exclusive experiences, managed on their behalf. Recognizing that time is your most precious asset, our specialty is navigating the intricacies of travel to guarantee a smooth and remarkable adventure from beginning to end.

list.title: Save time
list.content: We take over the time-consuming task of planning, optimizing, and managing travel, allowing clients to focus on other priorities.

list.title: Maximize loyalty
list.content: With our expertise in points, elite status, etc., we ensure clients make the most of their travels while flying the world’s best airlines and staying at world-class hotels.

list.title: Peace of mind
list.content: Our 24/7 emergency support gives you the assurance that help is always available, no matter what unexpected situations arise during their travels.

list.title: Customized service
list.content: Each travel strategy and trip is meticulously planned according to your preferences and goals, offering a fully personalized experience.

hero.title: What is Prince Collection?
hero.content: Prince Collection is a full-service travel brand with an emphasis on luxury travel. We offer on-site reviews of the most unique and bespoke properties worldwide, as well as guides to many travel rewards programs. We also feature an in-house travel agency and a luxury travel concierge. Prince Collection is a leading resource for travelers looking for their next great travel experience.

section1.title: We've been there
section1.content: Prince Collection’s on-site reviews set us apart from other luxury travel brands and agencies. We’re physically sending our team to the most unique destinations worldwide so our recommendations come from

section2.title: Access Prince Collection
section2.content: We are here for every step in the luxury travel journey. For those looking for their next destination, our on-site reviews provide inspiration for your next trip. For those ready to book, our in-house travel agency will book you with the best hotels worldwide. Prince Collection also offers a luxury travel concierge for those who need a completely hands-off travel experience.

list.title: Content
list.content: At Prince Collection, we’re focused on premium luxury travel content. Whether you are interested in the latest in luxury travel, finding inspiration for your next trip, or getting in-depth information on hotel programs and our premier brands and vendors, Prince Collection has covered it.

list.title: Travel Agency
list.content: Discover unparalleled luxury with Prince Collection’s Travel Agency, which specializes in booking exclusive hotel stays for you. Tailored for discerning guests, booking with our Travel Agency offers additional benefits at no extra cost to you. Share your preferences and destination with our experts, and we tailor a personalized getaway for you.

list.title: Concierge
list.content: Prince Collection’s Travel Concierge is designed exclusively for high net worth individuals and companies looking for white-glove travel experiences. Time is your most valuable asset, so Prince Collection’s Concierge ensures a seamless and extraordinary journey from start to finish.

meta.title: Prince Collection | Newsletter
meta.description: Sign up for the Prince Collection newsletter for news, reviews, deals, and exclusive travel information delivered straight to your inbox.

newsletter.title: It’s travel reimagined
newsletter.content: Stories that move the world in your inbox. We focus on inspiration, innovation, and solutions, presenting a balanced take on the latest news, ideas, and technology shaping the future of travel.
newsletter.privacy: By providing your email, you agree to the Prince Collection Privacy Policy

faq.title: Do you charge any booking fees?
content: No! We charge no additional fees for handling bookings. You’ll pay the same price as the best flexible rate offered by the hotel, all while enjoying extra benefits.
The fee structure is subject to change.

faq.title: How are you able to offer these additional benefits?
content: Luxury hotel groups offer these additional benefits and promotions to clients of the world’s leading travel agencies in order to capture significant volumes of guest spending through these agencies.

faq.title: What rates will I pay when booking with Prince Collection?
content: In most cases, you’ll pay the same rate as the best flexible (i.e., fully refundable) rate offered directly by the hotel.

These rates may be higher than member-exclusive rates, prepaid rates, corporate rates, or other specific rate types outside of the best flexible rate, so you’ll want to weigh up the difference in rates against the additional benefits you receive.

In some cases, such as during property-specific 3rd/4th/5th Night Free promotions, booking with Prince Collection can result in paying lower effective rates compared to the best publicly available rate.

faq.title: Will I get elite status benefits, points, and qualifying nights?
content: Yes! The benefits you receive when booking hotels with Prince Collection are in addition to the benefits you’d get as an elite member of a hotel loyalty program.

Furthermore, Prince Collection bookings are eligible to earn points and qualifying nights within hotel elite status programs, helping you get closer to your next points redemption or a higher elite tier.

faq.title: Will I get elite status benefits, points, and qualifying nights?
content: Submit an inquiry via the booking form to get started.
Our travel advisors will work with you to identify the best property for your needs and help you understand the benefits you’ll receive.
When you’re ready to book, we will collect your credit card information via a PCI-compliant submission process and pass it along to the property to guarantee your booking.

After your booking is confirmed, we will communicate with the hotel on your behalf with respect to room preferences, upgrade requests, special occasions, etc., to ensure you have the best possible experience during your stay.

faq.title: How does the booking process work?
content: Submit an inquiry via the booking form to get started.
Our travel advisors will work with you to identify the best property for your needs and help you understand the benefits you’ll receive.
When you’re ready to book, we will collect your credit card information via a PCI-compliant submission process and pass it along to the property to guarantee your booking.

After your booking is confirmed, we will communicate with the hotel on your behalf with respect to room preferences, upgrade requests, special occasions, etc., to ensure you have the best possible experience during your stay.

booking.title: Book with Us
booking.content: Discover unparalleled luxury with Prince Collection’s Travel Agency, where we specialize in arranging exclusive hotel stays. Tailored for discerning guests, we offer additional benefits at no extra cost. Begin by sharing your preferences and destination, and our experts will promptly tailor your exquisite getaway.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Prince Collection stands at the forefront of luxury travel and lifestyle, curating exceptional experiences for those who seek the extraordinary. As a beacon of exclusivity and sophistication, we invite you to connect with us. Share your vision of unparalleled travel or inquire about our insights into the world of luxury. Start by providing some initial details, and a Prince Collection representative will be in touch to explore the boundless possibilities that await you.

footer.title: Prince Collection
footer.content: Prince Collection is a full-service luxury travel brand featuring an in-house travel agency and travel concierge. We are a leading resource delivering on-site reviews, comprehensive guides, and the latest industry news.
copyright: Prince Collection is a licensed travel agency, registered in the province of Ontario, Canada.
